snippet: The former Ohio State coach Jim Tressel and Kansas State Coach Bill Snyder were selected for induction to the College Football Hall of Fame.
abstract: Former Ohio State football coach Jim Tressel and Kansas State coach Bill Snyder will be inducted into College Football Hall of Fame; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The former Ohio State coach Jim Tressel and Kansas State Coach Bill Snyder were selected for induction to the College Football Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Coaches Named to Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: Coaches Named to Hall of Fame
